Lafayette.Ridge, Lafayette Parish, Louisiana:
Ridge is an unincorporated community in Lafayette Parish, Louisiana, United States.
"Foreman Flats" was the original name of the area, which included Ridge Road in the north, Doc Duhon Road in the south, Lagneaux Road in the east, and South Fieldspan Road in the west. However, the Ridge area is known as residing between W. Congress Street, S. Richfield highway, Riceland Road and Sellers Road in Lafayette Parish.
